attributes.action: stop giving benefits that encourage people to have children,as it is easier than working
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
benefits now pay so much, most cant afford to work,once they get into the system,
why should some get housing free when i work and cant afford a house or a child
